text: Richard Rusczyk is one of the creators of the Mandelbrot competition, and the founder of Art of Problem Solving (AoPS) Inc, and Beast Academy He also founded the San Diego Math Circle. Rusczyk graduated from Princeton University in 1993. ==References== ==Other websites== *The Art of Problem Solving Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:American mathematicians
title: Richard Rusczyk
